template.template: Template HPE MSA for Zabbix 4.4 with SSL
template.name: Template HPE MSA for Zabbix 4.4 with SSL
template.description:
Monitor HPE MSA storages. Tested with HP MSA 2040, HP MSA 2050
Version: 0.7 Min. script version: 0.7
